pdx:embedHTML.pdx:data:
The list-style-type Property

Example of unordered lists:

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3
  • Other items:
    • Item 3.1
    • Item 3.2
    • Item 3.3
  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3

Example of ordered lists:

  1. Item 1
  2. Item 2
  3. Item 3
  4. Other items:
    1. Item 3.A
    2. Item 3.B
    3. Item 3.C
  1. Item 1
  2. Item 2
  3. Item 3
